content.value:
If *any* engineer screws up (not just juniors), use it as a chance to see where your processes, tools, docs, or training have let them down.

Everyone makes mistakes. If the screw up has a big impact, that's arguably on the business for not mitigating the risk, not the individual
content.html: If *any* engineer screws up (not just juniors), use it as a chance to see where your processes, tools, docs, or training have let them down. Everyone makes mistakes. If the screw up has a big impact, that's arguably on the business for not mitigating the risk, not the individual

content.value:
If a junior engineer screws up, make sure you tell them it's ok - we all make mistakes.

Don't leave them sat at home feeling miserable during a pandemic
content.html: If a junior engineer screws up, make sure you tell them it's ok - we all make mistakes. Don't leave them sat at home feeling miserable during a pandemic
